ValidationRule.description: Makes it not possible to edit a closed Retention Opportunity - Matthew Schetselaar
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( PriorValue(IsClosed), NOT( ISCHANGED( Closed_Owner_Role_Id__c ) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( Closed_Owner_Manager__c ) ), NOT( ISCHANGED( Closed_Owner_VP__c ) ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Finance", $Profile.Name <> "Client Engagement Manager" , $Profile.Name <> "Support Exec" , NOT(ISPICKVAL( $User.UserType , "AutomatedProcess" )), OR(RecordTypeId = "012i0000001Dyv7", RecordTypeId = "012i0000001Dyv4"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit a closed Retention Opportunity. Please see your manager.
